{"id":487972593,"lang":"java","time":"10Â months","timestamp":1619979671,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/487972593/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum Smaller","memory":"38.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int threeSumSmaller(int[] nums, int target) {\n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        int sum = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < nums.length - 2; i++) {\n            sum += twoSumSmaller(nums, target - nums[i], i + 1);\n        }\n        return sum;\n    }\n    private int twoSumSmaller(int[] nums, int target, int low) {\n        int high = nums.length - 1;\n        int sum = 0;\n        while (low < high) {\n            if (nums[low] + nums[high] < target) {\n                sum += high - low;\n                low++;\n            } else {\n                high--;\n            }\n        }\n        return sum;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum-smaller"}
